articles.description: English football clubs who signed a charter to improve diversity in their organisations have failed to meet six of their eight targets over the year to 31 July 2022
articles.content: English football clubs who signed a charter to improve diversity in their organisations have failed to meet six of their eight targets over the year to 31 July, with appointments in senior leadership… [+3865 chars]
